project("PushNotificationsDemo")

include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED PushNotificationsDemo_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "PushNotificationsDemo_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

  "${PushNotificationsDemo_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${PushNotificationsDemo_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "SS6MsF"
)
